scripts.demo.ios: npm run prepdemo && cd demo && tns emulate ios
scripts.demo.android: npm run prepdemo && cd demo && tns run android
scripts.prepdemo: npm run build && npm run reload
scripts.reload: cd demo && tns plugin remove nativescript-audioplayer && tns plugin add .. && tns install
scripts.gen.typings.ios: cd demo && TNS_TYPESCRIPT_DECLARATIONS_PATH="$(pwd)/../gen-typings" tns build ios && cd .. && cp gen-typings-i386/objc!LYTAudioPlayer.d.ts native-definitions/LYTAudioPlayer.gen.d.ts
